title: Israel is ready to attack Iran's nuclear facilities, Tehran has developed a retaliatory strike and threatens to attack US bases
text:
Israel is ready to attack Iran's nuclear facilities, Tehran has developed a retaliatory strike and threatens to attack US bases
Israel is ready to attack Iran's nuclear facilities, Tehran has developed a retaliatory strike and threatens to attack US bases.
Israel has officially notified the United States of its readiness to strike at Iran's nuclear facilities, the media reported.
Iran has developed a plan to retaliate using "hundreds of ballistic missiles" in the event of an Israeli attack â€” The New York Times, citing a senior Iranian official.
Iran is threatening to strike US bases in the region if a military conflict arises, Reuters reports, citing a statement by Iranian Defense Minister Nasirzadeh.
